FuncDef:
The re-authentication interval command configures the re-authentication duration of the IKEv2.
The undo re-authentication interval command restores the default setting.
By default, the re-authentication function is not enabled.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the re-authentication duration.
It is an integer and ranges from 60 to 604800 seconds.

ExtraInfo: The re-authentication interval command is applicable only for IKEv2 protocol.
